title: All new mail going to All Mall instead of Inbox
content: This was working ok until today. Now, only ONE of my mail accounts is sending mail to the "All Mail" folder as "Unread" and NOTHING is going to my Inbox. Anyone have an idea what could be causing this?
creator: DallasDaveVegas

title: Text size adjustment
content: I have just re- installed T'bird after a long break, I find the text too small, is there a command that enlarges the text size?
creator: mcbratneyjohn
